EmailTemplate.description: Request CMM/where used information from customer
EmailTemplate.name: CMM Request
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.CaseNumber}{!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}{!Case.Contact}{!Case.Product_Part__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting Honeywell Ground Support Solutions. Your case tracking number for this inquiry is provided above. If you wish to communicate with us further about this inquiry, you may reply to this e-mail -- please leave the Reference Case # within the subject line for quicker responses.
Dear {!Case.Contact},
We are having difficulty locating information related to part number {!Case.Product_Part__c}. Can you please provide the CMM (Component Maintenance Manual) or "where used" information for the part number you are interested in?
We appreciate your patience as we research your request.
Best Regards,
Honeywell Aerospace Ground Support Solutions
